items.sentence: Don\'t forget to open the window in your room.
Don\'t leave any valuables in your hotel room.
Even though he apologized, I\'m still furious.
Tell me if there\'s anything I can do to help.
Do you want us to take you back to your house?
I don\'t know if he will visit us next Sunday.
I don\'t know if you knew that already or not.
I don\'t know when Tom bought that dictionary.
If you see Tom, tell him I\'m looking for him.
It\'s getting late, so we\'d better get going.
Tom says he\'s lived in Boston his whole life.
Tom says that Mary can go, but that he can\'t.
Tom says that he doesn\'t feel like going out.
Tom was Mary\'s boyfriend before she met John.
Tom was hanged for a murder he didn\'t commit.
Tom wanted to hide the money from his ex-wife.
Tom wants to buy a house in this neighborhood.
Tom was a bit surprised by what Mary told him.
Tom was killed in an accident three years ago.
Tom was satisfied with the work Mary had done.
My brother is very good at playing the guitar.
Did you know that I\'d never done that before?
Did you know that Tom doesn\'t like chocolate?
Did you know that Tom was a friend of Mary\'s?
We can\'t talk here. Let\'s go somewhere else.
I\'m surprised no one else heard the gunshots.
I\'ve been really lonely these past two weeks.
I\'ve finally found the woman I want to marry.
Tom doesn\'t understand a word you\'re saying.
Tom doesn\'t understand why we\'re doing this.
I always have fruit and oatmeal for breakfast.
I always thought Tom knew how to speak French.
I always wash new underwear before wearing it.
I always wear a helmet when I ride my bicycle.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
They adapted themselves to the change quickly.
They had no money to buy concert tickets with.
They have something in common with each other.
Tom knows this area like the back of his hand.
Tom lives about twenty minutes away from Mary.
I don\'t want to hear another peep out of you.
I don\'t want to hear another word out of you.
I don\'t want to think about anything anymore.
I don\'t want you eating donuts every morning.
I don\'t want you to treat me any differently.
He told them that he had had a wonderful time.
He was sitting there with a pipe in his mouth.
Tom knows that Mary doesn\'t love him anymore.
Tom might like it, but I don\'t think he will.
I plan to go to Boston next Monday to see Tom.
